attributes.action: hold an immediate General Election following the massive vote of no confidence in his government and party by the electorate in the May 1st local elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has much to answer for at the ballot box - Home Information Packs - taxation on fuel and rising fuel and transport costs that adversely inmpact on the economy - increased stealth taxes -Northern Rock affair -  abolition of the 10p tax band fiasco -invasion of Iraq and associated misleading statements and misjudgements - raid on our pension funds - refusal to adhere to a clear unambiguous election pledge to hold a Referendum on the European Constitution renamed the Treaty of Lisbon - immigration out of control - declining standards in the NHS- rise in violent crime - to name but a few. The results of the May 1st elections clearly show that the government has lost the confidence of the electorate. We must have an election now!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
